flawed_nl_solution:
Jonsey is awake for 16 hours because 24 x (2/3) = <<24*(2/3)=16>>16
Jonsey spends 1/2 her day inside because 1 - (1/2) = 1/2
Jonsey spend 8 hours inside because 16 x (1/2) = <<16*(1/2)=8>>8
Riley is awake for 96/3 hours because 24 x (3/4) = <<24*(3/4)=96/3>>96/3
Riley spends 2/3 of his day inside because 1 - (1/3) = 2/3
Riley spends 64/3 hours inside because 96/3 x (2/3) = <<96/3*(2/3)=64/3>>64/3
In total they spend 88/3 hours inside because 8 + 64/3 = <<8+64/3=88/3>>88/3
On average, they spend 44/3 hours inside because 88/3 / 2 = <<88/3/2=44/3>>44/3
#### 44/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 96/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
